replies.body: This is fantastic! Thank you so much for making such a wonderful game continue to exist, HAPPY BIRTHDAY RIOT GAMES! :D {{item:3751}} <---This is a candle for you all! ...Can't find a cake Icon :P

Happy birthday, Rito. As a birthday present, I won't (verbally, as in to other people) complain about balance this week. :D
RIP my mock exams ggwp riot
I'm taking this as {{champion:43}} or something, today is also my Birthday too...ggwp Riot, have a good one
It's my bday too! thank you for being apart of the community, and happy birthday =D
mines in 4 days ;w; {{champion:32}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

Thought I'd share this, had a particular sick norms game back in 2012 when I was level 20ish (lol), added the dudes and we started playing together. 4 years later and I've been to Sydney from Perth for their 21st, shared thousands of hours on skype/discord/in game, and they're some of the best mates I've ever made. God this game makes me angry sometimes but I'd cop an afk/dc every game for the rest of league and the game would still be worth it because of the mates I've made. Churs riot, ya done gud.

dam 10 years and to say I payed this game in 2009 the a long time a good.{{summoner:4}} And to say I got said playing this game I kid you not by walk down stairs to hear my sister screaming play lol as ashe in twisted tree line with one of he friends with my saying with out even knowing or every hearing about this game saying that she doing it wrong to her saying ok you play for me and ohh boy did I love the game. the Most fun part was the friend she was playing with said he was a pro playing {{champion:254}}  and I beat the live Shite out of him {{champion:22}} Ps im spelling is shite and grammar too :/

i think i have a headache after that xD 
but still it was lovely to read :)
haha awesome story, glad you are enjoying the game. I hope you continue to be a part of our community. Thank your sister for showing you LoL =P
ive heard theres a new champ coming... is it true because im curious{{champion:17}}
The new champ is harambe{{champion:17}}

As I look back over the last 6 years, beginning with my time playing on NA servers with 186ping and still kicking butt, I can't help but shed a tear. I went on my first overseas trip with a friend, I've got a friend coming to my wedding both were met on League. This game changed my life in so many small ways. Happy Birthday Riot!!
That's awesome dude! It's changed a lot of our lives for the better here too! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thank you for creating such an amazing game guys. I wish I had of been into online games way before I found out about League, just so I could watch the game grow and develop from day dot.So thank you for the amazing game, even if you have cleared out my wallet. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Yep say thankyou riot and would also like to say thankyou for creating Jinx and thus helping me create the tattoo of mine that I love the most.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
riot kayle OG owners get a crown on top :P maybe?
Nope, get a different skin. {{item:3151}}
Like riot graves would be cool if you already owned riot kayle cause I never see anyone with it.
Riot Singed is way rarer imo
One of the rarer skins in game and possibly one of the best singed skins in game.
I got the icon but not the skin???

Damn... I've been playing league for 6 years now, 1 year in the PH server, one year in the Singaporean server, 1 in NA and the 3 now in oce, but even though sometimes players in the community may be a little too toxic like {{champion:17}} , there's just something about the game that keeps me comming back and playing a tleast one game a day. With that, thanks Riot for dis game
i r8 8/8 really apreci8. GL HF in future projects and please continue to make league into a better game {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} PS- 6 years of experience still Bronze :P (just been playing for fun all the years XD)

Besides all the nagging we do, and the constant hate that URF isn't a full time mode, we are all truly grateful for Riot and the work that goes into the only game worth playing in regards to MOBAs. Thank you for your time and dedication <3
TY Riot! A fantastic milestone for a fantastic game and company! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{item:3027}}
Happy Birthday Riot and Happy Birthday Maraudaur! :D

1. Happy Birthday Riot! Even though I've only recently began to play LoL its been a fun 3 months. Keep on being awesome!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
HAPPY BIRTHDAY AND CONGRATULATIONS RIOT! HOPE YOU CELEBRATE IT WELL!

I remember my first ever games of league were with my 2 brothers and I playing twisted treelines and 3 man ganking their solo lane and screaming "HERE COMES THE GOON SQUAD" while doing so. I've had so much fun playing this amazing game over the years and I want to thank Riot for keeping it alive. So here's to you Riot, GG
Thanks for being a amazing game company !! :D {{summoner:31}}  Thanks in advance for the icon and the skin!{{champion:10}}  {{item:2052}}

This might sound really stupid...

I had already owned the Riot Kayle Skin and when I saw that people who already Riot Kayle would receive a Mystery skin I was delighted. When I logged on this morning. I saw the Mystery Gift there saying "thank you". I then clicked awesome. But nothing showed.

The problem is I don't know where to activate it or open it. Plz help.  :)
Same, I just got the icon too. I think they might be giving the mystery gifts out later on, though.
i have gotten the icon but not the mystery gift. the icon came in a mystery gift tho. so does that mean i don't get a free champion or skin?
when will championship zed come to live severs? I have spare RP for it when It first comes out.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I just got a summoner icon.I own Kayle skin already so I should get another mystery gift right? :(
So does it take awhile for my gift to come in? or the pop up? I just received the pop up but didn't get anything?
I just receive a  summoner icon but I haven't got the kayle skin :(  {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
i like free stuff
tfw you own Judgement Kayle and are still cancer at the game{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Yep, I'm with ya.  Use the skin "omg you were around in Season 1??...and you're still in Silver..."

It's been a good five years Riot. You made me find the world of PC Gaming and e-Sports. It's been a rocky journey - but my love for this game, and this community, is eternal. To the next five years! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
WE ALL LOVE YOU RITO!!!!!! HAPPY BIRTHDAY

Hi all, just wanted to say, what a long way we've come! I only joined fairly recently, (as zac and aatrox were coming out) and wanted to give all of you at Riot Games an enormous thank you for the platform to make hundreds of new friends, and witness hilarities that would have been sorely missed without League. Without League, I'd be in a very different spot right now. So thank you to all the Rioters, and all if the community, toxic or otherwise. You make this game what it is, and that's what's truly important. When I log on and jump into a game of normals, I feel genuinely accepted, and that's just not something that happens in everyday life. eople say that gamers are the most toxic people around, but I can assure you, we are far from it. Here's to these past 10 years, and all of what comes next!
Where's Draven's cake?{{champion:119}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} Happy Birthday Rito {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
